You are assigned a People Partner/People Advisor from your first day with us. On your Onboarding Portal, you can always see who your People Partner/People Advisor are and quickly connect with them through the “PEOPLE WHO MAY HELP” section. Also, this information available in your workplace in \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/workplace/\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Telescope\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You may contact them with any questions you have related to your employment with EPAM, except for those related to your project. Your dedicated People Partner/People Advisor will be in touch with you in the first week of you joining as well as regularly during your probationary period (if it applicable for your location) and after. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can reach out to your Unit People Partner/People Advisor if you A Buddy helps you to acclimate to EPAM’s (or the customer's) culture and workplace.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":5779,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/121deece-5b2e-4393-af92-1644677b223c/M.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/121deece-5b2e-4393-af92-1644677b223c/M.PNG?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"M.PNG\",\"name\":\"M.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"121deece-5b2e-4393-af92-1644677b223c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":754,\"height\":59},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At EPAM we have many mentoring programs aimed at teaching basic primary skills or new technologies. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Mentor is a person who has a wealth of knowledge and experience in the professional area, motivated to spend personal time for knowledge transfer. If you feel that your expertise needs to be developed or want to acquire new skills and knowledge required for working on a project, you can take part in our Mentoring program where you will be given a Mentor.
